name: Gothenburg European Office
legal: Local Governement (City owned company under swedish law)
goal: Gothenburg European Office represents the city of Gothenburg and its key stakeholders in Brussels and assists with monitoring and lobbying on issues that are relevant fo the City of Gothenburg.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy Package
Cohesion policy
Urban agenda
Energy efficiency
Performance in Buildings
Smart Cities
